content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, thank you for taking the time to visit my apartment in Munich. I am pleased to hear that you are interested in renting it. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains from this rental arrangement. May I ask what rental price range you are considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay up to 500 Euros per month. Can you give me a price?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest, Mary. I must say that your rental budget of up to 500 Euros per month is quite generous for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich. However, I am afraid that I cannot accept your offer at this time. My rental price for this apartment is higher than 500 Euros per month. Would you be willing to negotiate on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I am willing to negotiate. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mary. My proposed rental price for this apartment is 600 Euros per month. I believe that this is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich, given the current market conditions. Would you be willing to consider this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
